articles.author: Aayush Kataria
articles.title: Mohammed Siraj Talks In English After Winning MOTM; Translator Jasprit Bumrah Urges Him To Speak Hindi - Watch - Times Now
articles.description: Mohammed Siraj won the Player of the Match (POTM) award in India's victory in the Cape Town Test against South Africa. Siraj took a six-wicket haul in the first inning. Jasprit Bumrah won the Player of the Series (POTS) award. Bumrah helped Siraj as a transla…
articles.content: Dhanashree Verma, Manisha Rani, Sagar Parekh And Others Compete To Be 4 Wildcard Contestants On JDJ 11
